name: A busca
description:
"A Busca" is the first project created by the NoLootBox team. It is a 2.5D adventure game with cartoon features located during the Bronze Age. You play as Eghan, son of the leader of a Viking village, he is about to start a test to become a man and, therefore, to show himself worthy of being the next leader of the village, for that, he needs to start a difficult journey and exciting. that ends at the top of the highest mountain.

You (the player) will take Eghan on this journey and will prove to be able to overcome each challenge and reach the end of this adventure.

Currently, the game is being produced by 8 students in design and programming of digital games, from the conceptual arts to the end of the project, your followers will be able to see every step we are taking towards delivery.

We hope to release an alpha version in three months for players to try to give their opinion and give us their opinion on what we can improve, change and remove.
